title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Minister for Rural
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Policing, Security and Community Safety 
Act 2024 (An Oifig Náisiúnta um Shábháilteacht Pobail) (Establishment Day) 
Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited policing security community safety act 2024 (an oifig naisiunta um shabhailteacht pobail) (establishment day) order 2025

title: Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024), having consulted with the Minister for Rural
heading: 2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of April 2025 is appointed to be the establishment day of 
An Oifig Náisiúnta um Shábháilteacht Pobail for the purposes of Part 3 of the 
Policing, Security and Community Safety Act 2024 (No. 1 of 2024). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

2 April, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th April, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [109] 3
